__e: That's fine, but I'm surprising you by taking the high road - and I'm not accepting your resignations. - We're not offering them.
I'm not trying to be noble, you know. Or not saying I know what would happen.
We're long past the opportunity for noble sacrifice.
Surely, when you close your eyes at night, you pray for a man of noble character.
I always said you were a noble guy.
I knew a man once a noble man, a man of principle who loved my father and my father loved him
It was a noble cause, and I applaud your efforts.
You know, he wouldn't spend a moment at home with me, Yet he would happily die for a stranger, If it were for a noble cause.
What you are doing to those poor people, it's distasteful, maybe even cruel, but you're doing it for a noble purpose.
